trans-unit.source: [+2]: Target opponent exiles cards from the top of their library until they exile a nonland card. Until end of turn, you may cast that card without paying its mana cost. [+1]: Each opponent exiles two cards from their hand. [−4]: Nicol Bolas, God-Pharaoh deals 7 damage to target opponent, creature an opponent controls, or planeswalker an opponent controls. [−12]: Exile each nonland permanent your opponents control.
trans-unit.target: [+2]: Target opponent exiles cards from the top of their library until they exile a nonland card. Until end of turn, you may cast that card without paying its mana cost. [+1]: Each opponent exiles two cards from their hand. [−4]: Nicol Bolas, God-Pharaoh deals 7 damage to target opponent, creature an opponent controls, or planeswalker an opponent controls. [−12]: Exile each nonland permanent your opponents control.

trans-unit.source: Samut, the Tested
trans-unit.target: Samut, the Tested

trans-unit.resname: PHOU·144s | Samut, the Tested | Card Text
trans-unit.source: [+1]: Up to one target creature gains double strike until end of turn. [−2]: Samut, the Tested deals 2 damage divided as you choose among one or two targets. [−7]: Search your library for up to two creature and/or planeswalker cards, put them onto the battlefield, then shuffle.
trans-unit.target: [+1]: Up to one target creature gains double strike until end of turn. [−2]: Samut, the Tested deals 2 damage divided as you choose among one or two targets. [−7]: Search your library for up to two creature and/or planeswalker cards, put them onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

trans-unit.resname: PHOU·145s | The Scarab God | Card Name
trans-unit.source: The Scarab God
trans-unit.target: The Scarab God

trans-unit.resname: PHOU·145s | The Scarab God | Card Text
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your upkeep, each opponent loses X life and you scry X, where X is the number of Zombies you control. {2}{U}{B}: Exile target creature card from a graveyard. Create a token that's a copy of it, except it's a 4/4 black Zombie. When The Scarab God dies, return it to its owner's hand at the beginning of the next end step.
trans-unit.target: At the beginning of your upkeep, each opponent loses X life and you scry X, where X is the number of Zombies you control. {2}{U}{B}: Exile target creature card from a graveyard. Create a token that's a copy of it, except it's a 4/4 black Zombie. When The Scarab God dies, return it to its owner's hand at the beginning of the next end step.

trans-unit.source: Whenever a creature with a -1/-1 counter on it dies, draw a card. {1}{B}{R}: Put a -1/-1 counter on another target creature. When The Scorpion God dies, return it to its owner's hand at the beginning of the next end step.
